products.name: Coca-Cola
products.description:
A delicious drink taylored for the best of sugary pleasures.
It resounds to the experiences we have as a kid and it's someone's birthday and you can drink as much as you want, and then you burp a lot. And your parents tell you to stop, but you can't just stop because burping is so fun.

products.name: Toothpaste
products.description: Using a toothpaste every time you brush your teeth may not be recommended by most doctors, but it sure is disgusting to brush one's teeth without toothpaste, because all the food stuck n your teeth will come out and they taste bad and will make you want to puke, making you never want to brush your teeth again. So enjoy your toothpasted toothbrushing :)

products.name: Fancy Jacket
products.description: A Jacked the size S, because we don't sell jackets with other sizes besides S. Only jerks use sizes bigger than S. These people are a waste of space and should be put somewhere. Not killed, no bloodshed I don't like violence. But just put them where they woulnd't bother anyone.

products.name: Hairy Shampoo
products.description: A Shampoo that doesn't fall of the thing when you can't see anything and tries to guess where is the thing that you put it.

products.name: Just Pants
products.description: Pants that are the length of your legs, no matter how much you grow or shrink.

products.name: Rolls Rice
products.description: Rice with some actual taste. I know it's impossible but we made it!

products.name: Lots a Meat
products.description: Meat that doesn't get stuck on your teeth, so you can brush them and not want to puke with that 2 weeks old piece of meat that got stuck on our teeth

products.name: Toilet Paper Donkey Hole
products.description: Yep, just toilet paper. What else did you want?

products.name: Peperoni Pizza
products.description: Pizza that tastes good and make you want to eat more and more and oh boy i sure am hungry!

products.name: X-Cheese
products.description: Mutant cheese, will make your taste buds explode and regenerate right after.

products.name: Grandma Socks
products.description: Black socks specifically tailored to wear with shorts. Because apparently black sock with shorts is not the most ridiculous thing ever here in Germany....
